actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to permit adoption of more than two alien children under certain conditions.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to permit the approval of more than two orphan petitions for one petitioner on behalf of an alien child if the petition establishes that the adoption of such alien orphan will be conducted in accordance with applicable State and local standards and procedures.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to permit adoption of more than two alien children under certain conditions.
